Innovative mobile solutions to connect your business with your customers

At My Web Dev Company, I develop custom mobile applications that perfectly meet your business objectives while offering an exceptional user experience.

Whether you want to extend your digital presence, build customer loyalty, or create new services, I support you in designing and developing innovative, intuitive, and high-performing mobile applications for iOS and Android.

Discuss your mobile project

Types of mobile applications I develop

Native Applications

Native applications are developed specifically for iOS (Swift) or Android (Kotlin/Java). They offer the best performance and an optimal user experience by taking full advantage of device features.

Ideal for complex applications requiring high performance, access to device sensors (camera, GPS, accelerometer), or a perfectly smooth user experience.

Need a native app? Contact me

Hybrid Applications

Hybrid applications combine web and native technologies to work across multiple platforms with a single codebase. Developed with frameworks like React Native or Flutter, they offer an excellent balance between cost and performance.

Perfect for startups and SMEs looking to quickly launch an application on iOS and Android with a controlled budget, while maintaining a quality user experience.

Need a hybrid app? Contact me

Progressive Web Apps (PWA)

PWAs are web applications that offer an experience similar to native apps: installation on the home screen, offline functionality, and push notifications. They combine the advantages of the web (accessibility, SEO) and mobile applications.

Ideal for businesses looking for an economical and universal solution, accessible on all devices without going through app stores.

Need a PWA? Contact me

Eco-friendly Applications

I develop mobile applications following eco-design principles, aiming to reduce their environmental impact while improving their performance:

  • Resource optimization to reduce battery consumption
  • Efficient data management to limit network transfers
  • Media compression to reduce the application's size
  • Optimized code for maximum performance with minimum resources
  • Offline functionality when possible to reduce data consumption

An eco-designed application is not only better for the environment but also offers a better user experience and extended battery life.

Performance and User Experience

Performance is at the heart of my mobile developments:

  • Fast startup time to captivate the user from launch
  • Smooth interfaces without latency or jerkiness
  • Intuitive design following each platform's guidelines
  • Optimized animations for a pleasant visual experience
  • Rigorous testing on different devices and OS versions
  • User behavior analysis to continuously improve the experience

A high-performing application retains your users and improves your conversion rate.

Frequently Asked Questions

How much does it cost to develop a mobile application?

The cost of a mobile application varies considerably depending on its complexity, required features, and the type of development chosen (native, hybrid, PWA). A simple application can start from $6,000, while a complex application with a custom backend can represent an investment of $25,000 or more. I always provide you with a detailed quote after analyzing your specific needs.

How long does it take to develop a mobile application?

Development time depends on the project's complexity. Generally, a simple application can be completed in 2 to 3 months, a medium-complexity application in 3 to 6 months, and a complex application can take 6 months or more. I always provide you with a realistic timeline at the beginning of the project, with clear milestones to track progress.

Do you develop for iOS and Android?

Yes, I develop applications for both major platforms: iOS (iPhone, iPad) and Android. Depending on your needs and budget, I can propose native development specific to each platform for maximum performance, or hybrid development (React Native, Flutter) which allows creating an application for both platforms from a single codebase, thus reducing costs and timelines.

Do you offer maintenance services after launch?

Yes, I offer several maintenance packages to ensure your application functions properly over time: updates for compatibility with new versions of iOS and Android, bug fixes, performance improvements, and addition of small features. These services are essential to guarantee the longevity and security of your application.

How can I monetize my mobile application?

There are several monetization strategies we can explore together: initial purchase (paid at installation), in-app purchases (freemium), subscription (SaaS model), advertising, or indirect model where the application supports your main business. I advise you on the strategy best suited to your target audience and business model.

How does the app store publication process work?

I support you throughout the publication process on the App Store (iOS) and Google Play Store (Android). This includes preparing assets (icons, screenshots), writing descriptions, configuring product pages, and managing validation processes. I can publish the application under your developer account or guide you in creating your own.

Will my application need a backend/server?

It depends on your application's features. Applications that need to store user data, synchronize across multiple devices, or offer features like authentication or payments will generally need a backend. I develop complete and secure backend solutions tailored to the specific needs of your mobile application.

How do you ensure data security in the application?

Security is a priority in all my developments. I implement best practices in mobile security: encryption of sensitive data, secure authentication, protection against common vulnerabilities, GDPR compliance, and regular security testing. I also advise you on privacy policies and terms of use.

Can you integrate features like geolocation or push notifications?

Absolutely! I can integrate a wide range of advanced features in your application, including: geolocation, push notifications, in-app payments, augmented reality, image recognition, chat and messaging, offline synchronization, and many others. These features are implemented following best practices for each platform.

How do you measure the success of the application after launch?

I integrate analytics tools (Firebase Analytics, Mixpanel, etc.) to track your application's performance. We can measure key metrics such as the number of active users, retention rate, time spent in the application, user journeys, and conversion rates. I also offer regular reports and recommendations to continuously improve your application.

What if I want to add new features later?

All my applications are designed to be scalable. You can contact me at any time to add new features or evolve your application based on user feedback and your changing needs. I will provide you with a quote for these additional developments and schedule updates in a way that minimizes impact on your existing users.

Ready to launch your mobile app project?

Contact me today to discuss your needs and get a personalized quote for your mobile application.
